definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)

sentences.english: But Mr. Xiong insisted that Rio would continue acting independently.
sentences.chinese: 但熊維平堅持說，力拓將會繼續獨立運營。

sentences.english: Thanks to BHP's bear-hug, that option was closed to Rio.
sentences.chinese: 由於必和必拓的熱烈擁抱，力拓失去了這一選擇。

sentences.english: China: Evidence in Rio spying case is strong.
sentences.chinese: 中國稱，力拓間諜案的證據充足。

sentences.english: The indictments' timing came as a surprise to the defendants' attorneys. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 力拓員工受到起訴的時間出乎被告律師的意料。

sentences.english: Chinalco's former president Xiao repeatedly described the Rio deal as a financial investment.
sentences.chinese: 肖亞慶曾一再強調與力拓的交易爲金融投資。

sentences.english: Shareholders wanted the company to launch a smaller rights issue to help pay the debt.
sentences.chinese: 股東希望力拓發起一次小規模的擴股來償還這筆債務。

sentences.english: IN ONE respect Rio Tinto’s relationship with China is clear.
sentences.chinese: 一方面力拓集團和中國的關係是很明白的。

sentences.english: Yesterday's admissions will embarrass Rio Tinto, which counts China as its biggest customer.
sentences.chinese: 昨日的供述將使力拓尷尬。

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 shi2 you2 gong1 si1

definition: see 殼牌公司|壳牌公司[Qiao4 pai2 gong1 si1]

pinyin: Ka3 te4 bi3 le4 gong1 si1
